  • Method Details

    • update

      void update(INetwork network)
      For storage disks and blocks, the network detects changes and updates the IStorageCache accordingly. However, for blocks connected to an external storage the external storage itself is responsible for bookkeeping the changes and submitting them to the IStorageCache. That bookkeeping is supposed to happen in this method.

      It's called every external storage tick.

      Parameters:
      network - the network

    • getCapacity

      long getCapacity()
      Returns:
      the capacity of the connected storage
